title: minecraft.jar mod问题
author: kite1234
txt_content:
今天突然怀念1.2.3的高清材质，就下了个1.2.5的summerfields，可是没装高清补丁，所以弄了个纯净的jar，装好所有mod后又装了几个小mod，modloader、modloadermp和audiomod都装了，打开时就这样：
Mods loaded: 7
ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_CodeChickenCore 0.5.3
mod_NotEnoughItems 1.2.2.4
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_06 [1.2.5]
mod_FurnitureMod Furniture Mod v2.4.2 - 1.2.5
mod_SmartMoving 8.1
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

求大虾们帮我解决一下啊！没高清材质没mod急啊！

replies.author: 哇哈哈你是猪
replies.txt_content: 启动器更新简单整合，那个自带高清补丁，还有，一些基础MOD都自带

replies.author: kite1234
replies.txt_content:
哇哈哈你是猪 发表于 2012-7-22 12:06 
启动器更新简单整合，那个自带高清补丁，还有，一些基础MOD都自带
完全原版...不是sp的

replies.author: kite1234
replies.txt_content:
